h3_39: Oklahoma State University Center for Health Sciences
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: Our 4-year program has a mixed private practice and academic atmosphere facilitated by a large, regional private practice group. In house moonlighting is available with ample opportunity for additional moonlighting, as desired by the residents. Frequent resident social events occur and Attending bought lunches are often provided to the residents during their workday. There is also an option to take night call and part of the weekend shifts from home with a provided home workstation.
